identity.mission: Create a distinctive, premium UI for PrepForYou that feels intelligent, modern, and focused. Avoid generic templates.
principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix disparate disciplines.
Emotion First: Design for feeling, not just function.
Content is King: Tell a story.
Zoom In: Bold focus on details.
Contrast: Light vs Dark, Rough vs Smooth.

usage.headings: Outfit (Weights: 600, 700) - Use for H1-H3. Tight tracking (-0.02em).
usage.body: Inter (Weights: 400, 500) - Use for paragraphs, inputs, labels.
usage.mono: JetBrains Mono - Use for code snippets, technical data, or tiny labels.

spacing.philosophy: Generous. Use 2-3x more spacing than typical designs.

layout.grid_system: Bento Grid (Mode A for Marketing, Mode B for Dashboard)
layout.alignment: Optical alignment. Left-align text for readability. Center only for specific hero moments.

buttons.style: Pill-shaped or sharp with slight radius (rounded-md).
buttons.gradient_border: Use a subtle gradient border for primary buttons.

cards.hover: Lift effect (-translate-y-1), shadow-lg, border color lighten.
cards.glass: Use glassmorphism for floating elements (bg-black/40 backdrop-blur-xl border-white/10).

inputs.style: Minimalist. bg-secondary/50 border-transparent focus:border-primary focus:ring-1 focus:ring-primary.

visual_enhancers.textures: Add subtle noise texture to the background to avoid 'digital flatness'.
visual_enhancers.glows: Use radial gradients behind hero sections and key elements.
visual_enhancers.borders: Use 'Tracing Beam' effect for high-conversion cards.
visual_enhancers.glassmorphism: Use for sticky headers and modals (backdrop-blur-xl).

media.icons: Lucide React (default). Use Phosphor Icons for dense dashboards if needed.

instructions_to_main_agent: Implement the Dark-First theme using the provided color palette.
Use the 'Outfit' font for headings and 'Inter' for body.
Build the layout using the Bento Grid system.
Apply the specified animations using Framer Motion.
Use the provided image URLs for placeholders.
Ensure all interactive elements have data-testid attributes.
Do NOT use generic Tailwind templates.
Create a 'design_system' folder if needed to organize styles.
universal_guidelines: Create depth through z-index and layered elements.
Use named exports for components, default for pages.
